about:
Welcome to my developer portfolio! I am a passionate and versatile developer with experience in projects utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as React and Node. My love for technology goes beyond web development, as I am also deeply fascinated by the realms of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. 
When I'm not immersed in coding or exploring AI, you can find me engaging in various sports activities like Football, Cricket, Basketball etc. Additionally, I have a flair for cooking, turning the kitchen into my creative playground. 
Through this platform, I aim to showcase my work, share my insights, and connect with fellow tech enthusiasts. Let's explore the exciting possibilities together!
